seo.title: AI GENESIS — The Future Starts Here
seo.description: Join the ultimate AI hackathon where visionaries, coders, and creators come together to build groundbreaking AI solutions. Compete, learn, and shape the future.

hero.headline: Build Bold AI at AI GENESIS
hero.subhead: A global hackathon bringing together developers, designers, and innovators to push the boundaries of artificial intelligence.

items.title: Cutting-Edge AI
items.body: Dive into the latest in AI agents, vision models, infra tools, and consumer apps.

items.title: Community & Mentorship
items.body: Learn from top mentors, collaborate with peers, and grow your skills.

items.title: Global Impact
items.body: Build solutions that don’t just impress judges but also make a difference.

cards.title: Agents
cards.body: Design autonomous AI workflows to solve real-world problems.

cards.title: Vision
cards.body: Revolutionize accessibility, healthcare, and industry with computer vision.

cards.title: Infra
cards.body: Develop scalable tools for safety, evaluation, and AI infrastructure.

cards.title: Consumer
cards.body: Build AI-powered products people love to use every day.

items.a: AI GENESIS is open to anyone 16+ worldwide. Teams can have up to 4 members.
A GitHub repository with your code, a README, and a 2-minute demo video.
By impact, originality, technical execution, and user experience.

final_cta.headline: Be Part of the AI Revolution
